subject: Hockey, Ice
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The fan base and the finances of the N.W.H.L. and the C.W.H.L. are promising, but the question is whether a merger of the two leagues would benefit the game.
snippet: The fan base and the finances of the N.W.H.L. and the C.W.H.L. are promising, but the question is whether a merger of the two leagues would benefit the game.
